text: Limnocharidae is a family of mites in the order Trombidiformes. There are at least 4 genera and about 12 described species in Limnocharidae. ==Genera== These four genera belong to the family Limnocharidae: * Austrolimnochares Harvey, 1998 * Limnochares Latreille, 1796 * Rhyncholimnochares Lundblad, 1936 * † Neolimnochares Lundblad, 1937 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Limnocharidae
